first_aid.title: Apple Cider Vinegar for Mole Removal
first_aid.description: Soak a cotton ball in apple cider vinegar and secure it to the mole with a bandage for a few hours daily. Repeat everyday and the mole will dry up and fall off. Takes about 7 days to see results.
steps: Soak cotton ball in apple cider vinegar
Place on mole and secure with bandage

cold_flu.title: White Willow Bark Natural Aspirin
cold_flu.description: Create a natural aspirin tincture using White Willow Bark - the original source of aspirin. Perfect for headaches and inflammation.
steps: Fill jar 1/3 with dried white willow bark
Strain and store in dark bottle

cold_flu.title: Feverfew Tincture for Migraines
cold_flu.description: Feverfew is excellent for preventing and treating migraines. This tincture provides concentrated relief.

cold_flu.title: Cloves for Cough Relief
cold_flu.description: Cloves contain eugenol, a natural anesthetic that helps soothe coughs and sore throats.
steps: Steep 5-6 whole cloves in hot water for 10 minutes

cold_flu.title: Onions in Socks for Cough
cold_flu.description: An unusual but effective remedy - sliced onions in socks can help reduce nighttime coughing.
steps: Put socks on feet before bed

cold_flu.title: Oil Pulling for Overall Health
cold_flu.description: Ancient Ayurvedic practice that supports oral health and may boost immunity.
steps: Take 1 tablespoon of oil in mouth

digestion.title: Lavender Oil in Belly Button for Relaxation
digestion.description: Applying organic lavender oil to the belly button can provide deep relaxation and aid digestion.
steps: Mix 1-2 drops lavender oil with carrier oil if sensitive

digestion.title: Belly Button Oil Therapy
digestion.description: The belly button connects to thousands of veins. Different oils can treat various conditions through this ancient practice.
steps: Apply 2-3 drops to clean belly button
Leave overnight or for several hours

digestion.title: Hibiscus Tea for Blood Pressure
digestion.description: Natural remedy to help lower high blood pressure with delicious hibiscus tea.
steps: Steep 1-2 tsp dried hibiscus in hot water
Strain and add honey if desired

skin_hair.title: Castor Oil for Hair Growth
skin_hair.description: Castor oil promotes eyebrow growth and can be used on face as a non-comedogenic moisturizer.
steps: Can also use on face as moisturizer

skin_hair.title: Lemon Balm Healing Salve
skin_hair.description: Homemade healing salve using lemon balm, perfect for skin irritations and minor cuts.
steps: Infuse olive oil with lemon balm for 2 weeks
Add infused oil and vitamin E
Add essential oil and pour into containers

skin_hair.title: Yarrow Anti-Inflammatory Salve
skin_hair.description: Create your own yarrow salve for cuts, bruises, and inflammation using foraged herbs.
steps: Infuse in olive oil for 2 weeks

pain_relief.title: White Willow Bark for Headaches
pain_relief.description: Natural aspirin alternative that's been used for centuries to treat headaches and pain.
steps: For tincture: steep bark in alcohol for 2-4 weeks
For tea: simmer 1 tsp bark in water for 15 minutes

pain_relief.title: Mind Over Matter Pain Relief
pain_relief.description: Mental techniques to help manage and reduce pain naturally using visualization and breathing.
steps: Breathe deeply and imagine pain intensity growing

sleep_stress.title: Lemon Balm Tincture for Anxiety
sleep_stress.description: Incredibly effective natural anxiety relief comparable to prescription medications but without side effects.
steps: Fill jar with fresh lemon balm
Steep for 2-4 weeks in dark place
Take 1-2 droppers as needed for anxiety

sleep_stress.title: Natural Sleep Herbs (Non-Melatonin)
sleep_stress.description: Herbal alternatives to melatonin that promote restful sleep without nightmares.
steps: Mix equal parts of chosen herbs
Steep 1 tsp mixture in hot water

sleep_stress.title: Anxiety Relief Smoke Blend
sleep_stress.description: Herbal smoking blend for anxiety and stress relief using natural, calming herbs.
steps: Mix all dried herbs in bowl
Can add to tobacco or cannabis

sleep_stress.title: Magnesium for Mental Health
sleep_stress.description: How magnesium supplementation can dramatically improve depression, anxiety, and overall mental wellness.
steps: Take with food to avoid stomach upset

sleep_stress.title: Relaxing Herbal Smoke Blend
sleep_stress.description: Custom blend of mugwort, skullcap, passion flower, lemon balm and chamomile for deep relaxation.
